mapper.select: select co.sell_cnt from (select c.no,o.no order_no,c.member_email,count(c.member_email) as sell_cnt from p1_cart c INNER JOIN p1_order o on c.no = o.cart_no GROUP BY c.member_email) co INNER JOIN p1_member m on co.member_email = m.email where m.email=#{email}
mapper.update: update p1_member set block = #{block} where email=#{email}
mapper.select: select m.block,m.email,m.name,co.sell_cnt,m.date1,m.code from (select c.no,o.no order_no,c.member_email,count(c.member_email) as sell_cnt from p1_cart c INNER JOIN p1_order o on c.no = o.cart_no GROUP BY c.member_email) co INNER JOIN p1_member m on co.member_email = m.email where m.email=#{email};

select co.no,co.qty,i.name,i.no as item_no, i.price,co.date1 from p1_market i inner join (select o.no,o.qty,c.item_no,o.date1 from p1_order o inner join p1_cart c on c.no = o.cart_no where c.member_email=#{email}) co on i.no = co.item_no order by co.no desc LIMIT #{page},10

select co.qty,i.price,co.date1 from p1_market i inner join (select o.no,o.qty,c.item_no,o.date1 from p1_order o inner join p1_cart c on c.no = o.cart_no where c.member_email=#{email}) co on i.no = co.item_no order by co.no desc
select count(o.no) as totalpage from p1_order o inner join p1_cart c on c.no = o.cart_no where c.member_email = #{email}
